module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.2* #3815 *2.6.0.1* #3611, #3435, #3317, #3307 *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.1.3* localization fixes *2.5.1.2* localization fixes *2.5.1.1* #2718 fix orphaned call not going to destination *2.5.1* #2067 change recording to recording id *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.6* #2604, #2716, #2843 fix mal-formed html tags, localization fix, Russian Translation *2.4.0.5* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.4* removed parkhints on Asterisk 1.2, metermaid already does and this creates undesired hints *2.4.0.3* change to core_conf and features_general_addtional.conf, no more parking_additianal.inc *2.4.0.2* create hints for Asterisk 1.4 and above *2.4.0.1* add parking_conf class, support PARKINGPATCH config *2.4.0* Destination registry, it translation *2.1.2.1* bump for rc1 *2.1.2* merge findmefollow/core extension destinations if any *2.1.1* fix pseudo hardcoded path issue (hardcoded form missing global) *2.1* Remove settings on uninstall bug #1597 *2.0.2* Add he_IL translation
